name: PageTurner GBC - Alpha Demo
description:
Play a game where your choices and the order in which you make means much more than simple "good" or "bad" on a moral number line. PageTurner (currently in pre-alpha development stage) is an RPG for the Game Boy Color built to be unlike any other handheld game you've played before. With more than 10 possible "true" endings, a world map that's built based on choices you make, 7 different end bosses and countless ways to die between, PageTurner promises replay value unlike any other game in your library!

PRE-ALPHA DEMO - This is a pre-release of the first official demo. Consider this Alpha 0.5, where Alpha 1.0 will be a completed demo. It will be updated often and will always have something new. I hope you'll check back regularly to see what's changed or improved :)

Notes: There's currently no music or sound, but I'm learning. 

0.5.1 -  Corrected Alroy's Alchemy scripts activating on entry.

DEMO RATED M FOR MATURE

Contains: Depictions of Alcohol, Mischief (both comic and violent), Foul Language, and moral choices that may or may not seem repulsive to some players.
